title: Headshot
description: A young man washes ashore, his memory gone - but his past comes back to haunt him after he is nursed back to health and his killing ability is needed when he takes on a powerful drug lord.

reviews.text: One of the most underestimated Thai films. There are certain logical flaws and some parts too perfect to be true,still, it's an outstanding movie. I don't reckon the police himself is looking for some sort redemption, but, rather sacrificing himself to let justice prevail,and this belief let him down into the pitfall.
